name: Witchy Game - Jam-O-Lantern Submission
description:
A 1v1 multiplayer turn based strategy game with a magic system that relies of the position of the units on one team relative to one another.

But only the tile movement and spell recognition work - not even networking is functional at this step, just click Host+Client to spawn your players and begin

WASD to pan camera

click on unit to move

press 'cast spell' to check if you have a valid spell: it will be shown in the upper left

Currently valid spell orientations:

Knight-move L shape with witch on short arm

1x5 with witch at center

1x5 offset by 1 from center
